3.9. Route Editor

    Create the file route.txt with these fields:
            code
            report
            receipt
            encrypt_program
            encrypt
            pgp_key
            pgp_cc_key
            cyber_mode
            credit_card
            profile
            inline_profile
            email
            attach
            counter
            increment
            continue
            partial
            supplant
            track
            errors_to
    Add this line in catalog.cfg:
    RouteDatabase route
